verbs.description: [V: astros] justin verlander prepares for challenges of facing red sox again thursday night starter justin verlander said there are unique challenges to facing the same potent lineup within days of each other the astros won the series first game 7 - 2 behind verlander six innings in boston on saturday houston astros boston astros justin verlander red sox
